title: Client woes! Wahoo! Can't queue up for anything but normal blind pick....
body: I opened up my client tonight in hopes of playing some ranked, however, when I went to select the game type, I click on it and it will not select. I logged out and tried to do it again, but no luck. I can't even play a co-op vs ai because it is locked. Has anyone else had this issue? Please help!!!! Thank you!

replies.body: Hello! I'm having this same issue currently, I've tried logging in again and it has still not been fixed, help would be appreciated.
It sounds like you might have lost sync and disconnected, but relogging should fix that.  Are you still having any issue?
